name: Introduction to the Robot
description: Getting familiar with the platform and learning how to control the robot.

lessons.name: Lesson example
lessons.description: How to control manipulator movement using lua script.

lessons.name: Sandbox
lessons.description: Experiment with a robot manipulator in a sandbox environment.
lessons.template:
-- Adjust speed parameters
local parameters={CP=1, SpeedJ=20, AccJ=10, SpeedL=20, AccL=10}

-- Command sequence to move the robot through various positions
MovJ({0,0,0,0}, parameters)
MovJ({0,60,85,0}, parameters)
MovJ({0,70,58,-0}, parameters)
MovJ({-30,80,35,0}, parameters)
MovJ({-30.5,15,15,0}, parameters)

-- Rotate the R-Axis
MovJ({-40,70,75,0}, parameters)
MovJ({-40,70,75,90}, parameters)
MovJ({-40,70,75,-90}, parameters)
